credit_line: Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
title: Fragment
provenance: From the Richard Cranch Greenleaf Collection.
medium:
Medium: silk
Technique: satin damask with discontinuous supplementary weft patterning (brocade)
description: Blue-green satin, brocaded in white, rose, green and light brown.  Pattern, symmetrically arranged, is of tree with large scale fruits.
name: Fragment
